data.lyric:
[ti:Baby (Album Version)]
[ar:Justin Bieber/Ludacris]
[al:My Worlds]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Baby (Album Version) - Justin Bieber/Ludacris
[00:00.78]Lyrics by：Terius Nash/Christopher Stewart/Christopher Bridges/Justin Bieber/Christina Milian
[00:02.36]Composed by：Terius Nash/Christopher Stewart/Christopher Bridges/Justin Bieber/Christina Milian
[00:03.94]Justin Bieber：
[00:04.20]Oh woah
[00:07.94]Oh woah
[00:11.56]Oh woah
[00:14.84]Justin Bieber：
[00:15.95]You know you love me I know you care
[00:19.66]Just shout whenever and I'll be there
[00:23.33]You want my love you want my heart
[00:27.05]And we will never ever ever be apart
[00:30.79]Are we an item
[00:32.77]Girl quit playing
[00:34.85]We're just friends what are you saying
[00:38.05]Said "There's another" and looked right in my eyes
[00:41.73]My first love broke my heart for the first time and I was like
[00:46.15]Baby baby baby oh
[00:49.32]Like baby baby baby no
[00:53.09]Like baby baby baby no oh
[00:57.17]Thought you'd always be mine mine
[01:00.86]Baby baby baby oh
[01:04.17]Like baby baby baby no
[01:07.90]Like baby baby baby no oh
[01:11.96]Thought you'd always be mine mine
[01:14.94]Oh for you I would have done whatever
[01:18.68]And I just can't believe we ain't together
[01:22.41]And I wanna play it cool but I'm losing you
[01:26.20]I'll buy you anything I'll buy you any ring
[01:29.77]And I'm in pieces baby fix me
[01:33.66]And just shake me 'til you wake me from this bad dream
[01:37.89]I'm going down down down down
[01:40.90]And I just can't believe my first love won't be around and I'm like
[01:45.22]Baby baby baby oh
[01:48.51]Like baby baby baby no
[01:52.18]Like baby baby baby no oh
[01:56.29]Thought you'd always be mine mine
[01:59.98]Baby baby baby oh
[02:03.23]Like baby baby baby no
[02:06.92]Like baby baby baby no oh
[02:11.03]Thought you'd always be mine mine
[02:14.30]Ludacris：
[02:14.47]Luda
[02:15.27]When I was 13 I had my first love
[02:18.52]There was nobody that compared to my baby
[02:20.13]And nobody came between us nor could ever come above
[02:22.38]She had me going crazy
[02:24.43]Oh I was starstruck
[02:26.15]She woke me up daily don't need no Starbucks
[02:29.90]She made my heart pound and skip a beat
[02:32.23]When I see her in the street and
[02:33.55]At school on the playground
[02:35.36]But I really want to see her on the weekend
[02:37.28]She knows she's got me dazing cause she was so amazing
[02:40.96]And now my heart is breaking but I just keep on saying
[02:44.27]Justin Bieber：
[02:44.55]Baby baby baby oh
[02:47.53]Like baby baby baby no
[02:51.21]Like baby baby baby no oh
[02:55.33]Thought you'd always be mine mine
[02:59.09]Baby baby baby oh
[03:02.31]Like baby baby baby no
[03:05.95]Like baby baby baby no oh
[03:10.12]Thought you'd always be mine mine
[03:12.90]I'm gone yeah yeah yeah
[03:15.69]Yeah yeah yeah
[03:16.56]Now I'm all gone
[03:17.61]Yeah yeah yeah
[03:19.39]Yeah yeah yeah
[03:20.26]Now I'm all gone
[03:21.47]Yeah yeah yeah
[03:23.08]Yeah yeah yeah
[03:24.03]Now I'm all gone gone gone gone I'm gone
data.trans:
[ti:Baby (Album Version)]
[ar:Justin Bieber///cris]
[al:My Worlds]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.78]//
[00:02.36]//
[00:03.94]//
[00:04.20]//
[00:07.94]//
[00:11.56]//
[00:14.84]//
[00:15.95]你知道你爱我 我知道你在意
[00:19.66]你只要呼唤我 我就会马上出现
[00:23.33]你渴望我的爱 你渴望得到我的心
[00:27.05]我们将永远永远都不分离
[00:30.79]我们是恋爱关系吧 
[00:32.77]女孩别再折磨我了
[00:34.85]我们只是朋友 你在说什么
[00:38.05]你直视我的眼睛 说什么 你的心里有别人了
[00:41.73]我的初恋就这样第一次伤了我的心 我就像
[00:46.15]宝贝 宝贝 宝贝
[00:49.32]宝贝 宝贝 宝贝
[00:53.09]宝贝 宝贝 宝贝
[00:57.17]我还以为你会永远属于我
[01:00.86]宝贝 宝贝 宝贝
[01:04.17]宝贝 宝贝 宝贝
[01:07.90]宝贝 宝贝 宝贝
[01:11.96]我还以为你会永远属于我
[01:14.94]为了你 我可以赴汤蹈火
[01:18.68]而我无法相信我们竟不能在一起
[01:22.41]我想要冷静 否则会失去你
[01:26.20]我会为你买任何东西 我会为你买任何戒指
[01:29.77]但现在我却已成碎片 亲爱的请把我拯救
[01:33.66]然后直到你把我从这场噩梦中摇醒
[01:37.89]我变得越来越沮丧
[01:40.90]我无法相信我的初恋已不在 我就像
[01:45.22]宝贝 宝贝 宝贝
[01:48.51]宝贝 宝贝 宝贝
[01:52.18]宝贝 宝贝 宝贝
[01:56.29]我还以为你会永远属于我
[01:59.98]宝贝 宝贝 宝贝
[02:03.23]宝贝 宝贝 宝贝
[02:06.92]宝贝 宝贝 宝贝
[02:11.03]我还以为你会永远属于我
[02:14.30]//
[02:14.47]//
[02:15.27]十三岁时我遇到了初恋情人 
[02:18.52]没有人能和我的宝贝相比
[02:20.13]没有人可以介入我们之间 我们的感情无法逾越
[02:22.38]她让我变得疯狂
[02:24.43]我就像是个追星族
[02:26.15]她白天能让我清醒 根本不用去星巴克
[02:29.90]她让我心跳加速
[02:32.23]当我在街上遇到她时我的心跳就会停一拍
[02:33.55]不管在学校还是操场 
[02:35.36]但我真的很想和她在周末见面
[02:37.28]她知道她让我目眩神迷 因为她是如此美丽
[02:40.96]现在我的心已成碎片 但我还是要不停地说
[02:44.27]//
[02:44.55]宝贝 宝贝 宝贝
[02:47.53]宝贝 宝贝 宝贝
[02:51.21]宝贝 宝贝 宝贝
[02:55.33]我还以为你会永远属于我
[02:59.09]宝贝 宝贝 宝贝
[03:02.31]宝贝 宝贝 宝贝
[03:05.95]宝贝 宝贝 宝贝
[03:10.12]我还以为你会永远属于我
[03:12.90]现在我完全放手了
[03:15.69]//
